p: The components present in the EO samples were identified using the mass spectra library NISTâ€™08, and were compared with the literature data [ 91]. A mixture of aliphatic hydrocarbons (C 8-C 40) was used to calculate the relative retention indices, under the same conditions mentioned above. The normalization method of the GC/FID peak areas was used to determine the percentage ratio of the EO components.
